config.desc: 合买代购（后台引擎SQL配置）
config.sql: select cpassword pwd from tb_agent where cagentid = ?

select '#gid#' gid,cperiodid pid,cbatchid bid, icount tnum, cadddate cdate, istate state, iflag flag, cerrcode ecode, cerrdesc edesc from tb_cast_#gid# where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) num from tb_cast_#gid# where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select '#gid#' gid,cperiodid pid,cbatchid bid, capplyid did, cticketid tid, cticketdate tdate, imulity muli, imoney money, cadddate cdate, ccodes codes, cerrcode ecode, cerrdesc edesc from tb_cast_list_#gid# where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) num from tb_cast_list_#gid# where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select '#gid#' gid,cperiodid pid,cbatchid bid, capplyid did, cticketid tid, cwdate wdate, ibonus bonus, itax tax, cwininfo winfo, ibig big from tb_bingo_#gid# where cagentid = ? and cwdate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and cwdate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) num from tb_bingo_#gid# where cagentid = ? and cwdate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and cwdate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')
select cgameid gid,cperiodid pid,isales sales, ismalls smalls, ibig bigs, itax taxs from tb_period_stat where cagentid = ?
select count(*) num from tb_period_stat where cagentid = ?
select cgameid gid,cperiodid pid,cbegintime stime, cendtime etime, cawardtime atime, istate state from tb_period where cgameid = ? and istate = 1
select count(*) num from tb_period where cgameid = ? and istate = 1
